text:
@BarackObama Dear ally's: Donation post❗️https://t.co/Fa1aCiOP1Y
The hard truth is black lives matter and protests might die as trends. Plz retweet and share. We cant let that happen.  Unless we can uplift black people globally dying in masses from Covid19, we will never have full change.
